creator.description:
⚠️Work in Progress⚠️
11/16/2024: Still working out how to set it up, completely learning from scratch.

Drag Labeler for drag artists to indicate their drag. Created by @kiyoshiyorha.bsky.social

locales.description: A person that expresses their drag regardless (or irregardless) of gender or any other label.
locales.name: Drag Artist

locales.description: A person that that expresses a non-human (or monstrous human), other worldy or fictional features/characteristics in their drag.
locales.name: Drag Creature

locales.description: A person that is an orignal (or imitation) drag persona.
locales.name: Drag Character

locales.description: A person that express either (or both) drag king or drag queen.
locales.name: Drag Monarch

locales.description: A person that that expresses masculinity or hyper-masculinity in their drag.
locales.name: Drag King

locales.description: A person that that expresses femininity or hyper-femininity in their drag.
locales.name: Drag Queen
